attributes.action: Time for a full independent inquiry into Labour Government’s Secret deals and behind-the-scenes 'negotiations' (dirty deeds) with Sinn fein, IRA.
attributes.additional_details: Time for a full independent inquiry into the Labour Government’s Secret deals and behind-the-scenes negotiations with Sinn feinI, IRA.  Get out of jail, stay out of jail cards and assurances given (secretly) by corrupt British Government 'Ministers' to convicted terrorists and murderers which has enabled them to be a protected species.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister has set up a judge led inquiry into the administrative scheme. The inquiry will be led by the Rt. Hon. Lady Justice Hallett
